import React from 'react' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import styles from './styles.module.scss' const PATTERNS = { NAME: /^[A-Za-z]+$/i, PASSWORD: /^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z]).{4, 8}$/, EMAIL: /^([a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.]+)@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.)|(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+\.)+))([a-zA-Z]{2,4}|[0-9]{1,3})(\]?)$/ } export default function Form() { /** implement form submission and write data to file or other */ const { register, errors, handleSubmit } = useForm() console.log(errors) return (

Create Your Account

{errors.companyName &&

{errors.message}

}
{errors.name &&

{errors.message}

}

Already have an account? Sign in

) }
